item.title: Tales from the .NET Migration Trenches - Middleware
item.description: Posts in this series:IntroCatalogingEmpty ProxyShared LibraryOur First ControllerMigrating Initial Business LogicOur First ViewsSession StateHangfireAuthenticationMiddlewareIn the last post, we looked at tackling probably the most important pieces of middleware - authentication.
